title: Nuna maram/ Manjanathi maram நுணா மரம்/ மஞ்சணத்தி மரம்

content.title: Uses
content.description: Fruit extract is used as a tonic. The wood is yellow coloured and light in weight. Plant is used in traditional medicine to treat various diseases. Plant has antibacterial, antiviral, antifungal, antitumor, anthelminthic, analgesic, hypotensive, anti-inflammatory and immune enhancing effects. Ajmalicine, digoxin, quinoline, rubiadin, rubiadin 1-methyl ether, saronjidiol, ursolic acid, alkaloids, anthraquinones and their glycosides, caproic acid, caprylic acid, and, flavones glycosides, flavonoids, indoles, purines, and β-sitosterol are present in this plant.
